bestBHT.bht: Do not be dismayed or despair, for the promise assures that she shall be made whole. The father must have had great faith, especially after witnessing the previous miracle. Although he had already taken measures to protect his daughter, he must believe in Jesus' ability to bring her back to life and have faith that she will be restored to perfect health and strength again.

Henry Alford: 50.] and she shall be made whole is only here.
Philip Schaff: The promise asked large faith from the father, but the miracle just wrought doubtless quickened Jairus’ confidence.
He was already in the house. He had already stopped the crowd outside, but meeting another within, those who could enter the chamber of death are singled out.
Archibald T. Robertson: And she shall be made whole (κα σωθησετα). This promise in addition to the words in Mark 5:36. See there for discussion of details.
John Gill: Fear not: do not be dismayed at this message, nor despair of help, notwithstanding such is the case.
Believe only, and she shall be made whole; exercise faith in me, that I am able to raise her from the dead, and I will do it.
She shall be restored to life, and to perfect health and strength again.

bhtAttempts.bht: Do not be dismayed or despair, for the promise in Luke 8:50 assures that she shall be made whole. The father must have had great faith to ask for such a miracle, especially after witnessing the previous miracle. Although he had already taken measures to protect his daughter by stopping the crowd outside, he must face another challenge within. However, he must believe in Jesus' ability to bring her back to life and have faith that she will be restored to perfect health and strength again.

Do not be dismayed or despair, for the promise assures that she shall be made whole. The father must have had great faith, especially after witnessing the previous miracle. Although he had already taken measures to protect his daughter, he must believe in Jesus' ability to bring her back to life and have faith that she will be restored to perfect health and strength again.

Fear not, do not be dismayed or despair, for believe in me and she shall be made whole. This promise requires great faith, but the recent miracle surely bolstered Jairus' confidence. Even though Jairus had already stopped the crowd and entered the house, he encountered another obstacle inside. Nevertheless, let not this message discourage you, but instead exercise faith in my power to raise her from the dead and she will be restored to life, fully healed and strong once again.

Fear not, for believe in me and she shall be made whole. This promise requires faith, but the recent miracle surely bolstered Jairus' confidence. Even though Jairus had already entered the house, he encountered another obstacle inside. Nevertheless, exercise faith in my power to raise her from the dead and she will be restored to life, fully healed and strong once again.

Do not fear or despair, for the promise is that she shall be made whole. Have faith and believe, for in doing so, she will be restored to life and perfect health. This promise asks for great faith from Jairus, but the recent miracle surely increased his confidence. Though he had already stopped the crowd outside and was already in the house, he encounters another challenge within. But despite the circumstances, even though it is a unique promise in Luke, do not be dismayed – have faith, for the Lord is able to bring her back from the dead.
